attributes.action: Reduce Primary School Teachers Salary to a Realistic, Fair Level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Im sick of seeing my taxes spent on individuals ability to afford 4x4's sports cars and coupes based on minimal hours per day and a luxurious amount of time away from work. Much of their reports and assessments are robotically generated by computer software. Their planning can be done using online resources. They are being paid huge salaries to tke responsibility for other peoples children in a roll betwixt school nurse and secretary. I have experienced this process first hand and find it an appalling misuse of government spending. Do you agree?

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
